title: SeeBiscuit
author: SeeBiscuit
created_time: January 05, 2023, 10:11:19 PMLast edit: May 08, 2024, 04:38:56 AM by SeeBiscuit

comments.author: DooMAD
comments.body: Quote from: SeeBiscuit on January 05, 2023, 10:11:19 PMI for real hope January 8th passes like 2012 on the Mayan calendar and nothing happens, I’m tired of all these crashes aren’t you guys?? Nah, pretty sure there's going to be some pretty serious controversy and drama coming very shortly.  Expect severe volatility.  Like... more than usual, I mean.Barry's fucked it.  Buy when it gets good.  Get the popcorn ready until then.

comments.author: DooMAD
comments.body: Quote from: SeeBiscuit on January 06, 2023, 01:02:49 AMWe live in a world with 7 coming onto 8 billion people.What % of this population do you feel have their opinions about something swayed by the following:HeadlinesInfluencers24 hour cable newsFor reasons beyond my fathom, those Winklevii media darlings seem to attract a disproportionate amount of media attention.  Any time they kick up a fuss, lots of people tend to follow.  This whole thing is merely a storm in a teacup and there is absolutely no threat to any Bitcoin fundamentals.  I just figure it's probably going to be a big song and dance and that there will probably be some resulting tumult in the markets.  No big deal, though.  Enjoy the show.
